title: Overview
description: Choosing the right data format is crucial for managing, storing, and analyzing longitudinal data efficiently. Formats like Apache Parquet and Arrow offer significant advantages in terms of performance, scalability, and interoperability.

title: Overview
description: Efficient storage and retrieval of longitudinal data are essential for large-scale studies. Whether you choose a traditional relational database like PostgreSQL or an in-memory solution like Redis, the right database can enhance both the speed and scalability of your analysis.
